sentences.english: Results Cerebrospinal rhinorrhea 14 from ethmoid sinus, 2 from sphenoid sinus.
sentences.chinese: 结果脑脊液漏14例位于筛窦，2例位于蝶窦。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effective nursing measures for the patients with cerebrospinal otorrhea and aurinasal leakage.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑脊液耳漏鼻漏病人有效的护理措施。

sentences.english: Objective To explore clinical features of meninges carcinoma and cytologic changes of CSF.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑膜癌病的临床特征和脑脊液细胞学改变。

sentences.english: Results 16 syphilitic had one or more than one treponemal antibodies in CSF.
sentences.chinese: 结果有16例梅毒患者脑脊液存在梅毒抗体。

sentences.english: There were no cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) leaks or delayed hemorrhages .
sentences.chinese: 未出现脑脊液漏或延迟性出血。

sentences.english: The manual cerebrospinal fluid storing chamber is arranged between the storing pool and the transfusing and guiding needle.
sentences.chinese: 人工脑脊液储存室设置在贮存池与输液导针间。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the nursing of image navigation system treatment on traumatic cerebrospinal rhinorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结经导航系统行鼻内镜治疗脑脊液鼻漏的护理。

sentences.english: Cerebrospinal fluid(CSF)microscopically and culture showed presence of cryptococcus neoformans.
sentences.chinese: 脑脊液显微镜下及培养均存在新型隐球菌。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the importance of cerebrospinal fluid(CSF)examinations in diagnosing meningeal carcinomatosis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑脊液检查对诊断脑膜癌病的重要意义。

sentences.english: The increase in cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) was significant too.
sentences.chinese: 脑脊液中亮脑啡肽含量明显增加。

sentences.english: Repeated lumbar punctures may be performed to clear the cerebrospinal fluid of such debris.
sentences.chinese: 可反复进行腰椎穿刺，将脑脊液中的碎屑清理掉。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the change of amino acid levels in the cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) of patients with neurocysticercosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察脑囊虫病患者脑脊液氨基酸含量的变化。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize our experience in managing cerebrospinal fluid(CSF) rhinorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结脑脊液鼻漏的诊断治疗经验。

sentences.english: Trauma to the facial bones is often associated with a cerebrospinal fluid rhinorrhea.
sentences.chinese: 面骨的外伤常并发脑脊液鼻漏。

sentences.english: Objective To explore clinical and cytological features of CSF in meningeal carcinomatosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑膜癌病的临床和脑脊液细胞学特征。

sentences.english: Hypovitaminosis A causes hydrocephalus by altering CSF resorption at the arachnoid granulations .
sentences.chinese: 维他命A不足也会造成蜘蛛膜对脑脊液出现吸收障碍。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
neutrophil (the most common type of white blood cell)
